title: a1466 2014 hangs
message: Hello, i have 2014 macbook air which works very slowly, once it showed strange image, photo attached.

title: a1466 2014 hangs
message:
Tesr external video.
Also try PRAM reset.

title: a1466 2014 hangs
message: PRAM reset changes nothing. On external monitor only image is transfered without icons.

title: a1466 2014 hangs
message: has anybody faced with similar problem?

title: a1466 2014 hangs
message:
Check how image appears on external monitor when internal image is distorted...
If only internal is affected, try other LCD assembly.
If problem persists on external, reflow RAM.
